entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
